title: UPDATED: Rider Protests, Foul Weather Force Neutralization of 80km of Giro d’Italia Stage 16
content:
Race descends into storm of late-hour dramas after peloton votes against Giro d'Italia organizer's original plans for snow-swept stage 16.

Read the full article at UPDATED: Rider Protests, Foul Weather Force Neutralization of 80km of Giro d’Italia Stage 16 on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
